description:
At the risk of his own life, Fennel sets up a blind date between Viola and a friend of his. Then, Viola and Alyssa spend a day babysitting a lizardkin egg.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Okute na Orc no Onegai Jijou / Tamago to Onee-san no Azukari Jijou
The Requesting Circumstances of the Late-Blooming Orc / The Monitoring Circumstances of the Egg and Big Sister
奥手なオークのお願い事情 / 卵とお姉さんの預かり事情
